title:
Multiplicity distributions in the eikonal and the $U$-matrix
  unitarization schemes
authors: E. G. S. Luna, M. G. Ryskin
abstract:
The multiplicity distribution of charged particles produced in the central
rapidity ($|\eta|<2.5$) region is calculated for the eikonal and the $U$-matrix
unitarization schemes using the AGK cutting rules and compared with the ATLAS
13 TeV data. The data favours the eikonal approach.
